description:
Change https://review.openstack.org/#/c/35303 deprecates the libvirt specific timeout option for "wait_shutdown_seconds" at the compute manager level.

This option should be removed in the J release
title: Remove deprecated option 'libvirt_wait_soft_reboot_seconds'
